channel.title: Windows 7 not loading client?
channel.description: In Windows 7 I downloaded the jre and the jdk versions of java, and installed them. I tried to run my client, but the only thing that happens is that the terminal pops up and disappears immediately with an error message that I can never read. It works fine on other OS's, but not Windows 7. Any help?

item.title: Windows 7 not loading client?
